text: Luigi Mastrangelo (born August 17, 1975 in Mottola, Italy) is an Italian men's volleyball player, a member of Italy national volleyball team, silver and bronze medalist of the Olympic Games, multiple winner of the European Championship and World League. He competed in the 2000, 2004, 2008 and 2012 Summer Olympics. He won a bronze medal in the 2000 and 2012 Games. He won a silver medal in the 2004 Games. ==References== * NBC Olympics profile * Sports reference profile Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:2008 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic silver medalists for Italy Category:Medalists at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy Category:Sportspeople from Apulia Category:Italian volleyball players
title: Luigi Mastrangelo
